data: Welcome to DaggerQuest, I will be your Guide. Click my portrait or the dialog box to progress through conversations.
Equip the armor and weapon on the table over there. Go forth, and slay the creatures terrorizing our land. Their leader is hiding out in a cottage to the northwest.
I am the Merchant. I have various weapons, pieces of armor, and items for sale. I also will buy anything you'd like to sell.
Take items out of my inventory to purchase them. Add your items to my inventory if you wish to sell them.
